about_the_game:
Use of this add-on requires the full version of the game (sold separately). You may also need to install the most recent game patch.

Craig Marduk, ferocious beast and Vale Tudo fighter, has joined the fray! Tower over your opponent before pummeling them with powerful techniques!

*Included in this add-on is Craig Marduk as a playable character.
Craig Marduk will also become playable in DLC1's new mode, "Ultimate TEKKEN BOWL."
